Title: WP7 App Launcher
Description:
WP7 App Launcher allows you to launch Windows Phone 7 applications directly in Emulator or device without the need to open Visual Studio.

Directly launching .xap file on Emulator is specially usable for application demos or to automate application launc from a .bat file.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WP7 Emulator Launcher allows you to launch Windows Phone 7 applications directly in Emulator without the need to open Visual Studio.

Directly launching .xap file on Emulator is specially usable for application demos or to automate application launc from a .bat file.
